moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Round
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

moves.name: Cotton Spore
moves.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the target, harshly reducing its Speed stat.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: An attack move that cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

moves.name: Aromatherapy
moves.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user's party.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.description: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Wish
moves.description: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.
